name: oas-cypress-automation
description: End-to-end automation test solution for Order Assembly Service using Cypress

scripts.test: rm -rf cypress/reports && cypress run --reporter mochawesome && npm run merge:reports && npm run generate:html-report
scripts.test:headed: rm -rf cypress/reports && cypress run --headed --reporter mochawesome && npm run merge:reports && npm run generate:html-report
scripts.generate:html-report: npx mochawesome-report-generator cypress/reports/report.json --reportDir cypress/reports --reportFilename index.html --reportTitle "OAS Cypress Test Report" --inline true
